As he said that, three gun batteries the size of an 18-wheeler each
swung in line with him, ready to fire at the first sign of agressivity
or defiance. The only thing was that the Iron Skulls had a very loose
definition of those words.

Sentry: You have trespassed on protected territory. Decline your
identity, and refrain from any inappropriate actions.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
>  Quickstrike had been wandering the various cities of this planet 
>  disgusted at all of the weaklings he ran across.  But now he had heard 
>  of people just as tough as he (thought that he) was. He held a map up 
>  showing the way to the Iron Skull base.
>  "He ya!  I found it!  You ready to kick some tail?"  He asked his 
>  snake head as if it were someone else.
>  "I"m a guess'in I just go up and knock." He said to himself as he 
>  walked up to the iron doors of their base.
>  "Anyone home!?"  He called.
